title: National Drink Wine Day | Key West Events at The Gates Hotel
seo_description: In honor, of National Drink Wine Day, enjoy delicious wine specials all day at the Gates Hotel (or 24 North Hotel) and $3 house wine specials!
short_description: In honor, of National Drink Wine Day, enjoy delicious wine specials all day at the Gates Hotel (or 24 North Hotel) and $3 house wine specials!
